Edit.Name: prpTaskPoint
Edit.Caption: Point
Edit.Help: This sets the task point for review.

Edit.Name: prpRange
Edit.Caption: Range
Edit.Help: For AAT tasks, this setting can be used to adjust the target points within the AAT sectors. Larger values move the target points to produce larger task distances, smaller values move the target points to produce smaller task distances.

Edit.Name: prpRadial
Edit.Caption: Radial
Edit.Help: For AAT tasks, this setting can be used to adjust the target points within the AAT sectors. Positive values rotate the range line clockwise, negative values rotate the range line counterclockwise.
